entry.summary: Data is among the most important things that make up a web application or a conventional native app. We need data to be able to see and perhaps understand the purpose of an application. In this article, weâ€™ll look at another approach to obtaining data in an application that requires authentication or authorization using Next.js.

entry.title: How To Build A Progressively Enhanced, Accessible, Filterable And Paginated List
entry.summary: Ever wondered how to build a paginated list that works with and without JavaScript? In this article, Manuel explains how you can leverage the power of Progressive Enhancement and do just that with Eleventy and Alpine.js.
